page.title: 18Tourism in the Wolfords
page.content: The area included in this block is not on the usual tourist routes even though it is in the fringe of the Cotswolds, which has meant that the three villages have remained unspoilt. The Fox and Hounds in Great Wolford, however, attracts customers from a long way to its bar and resturamt and its new bed and breakfast accommodation. The pub in Todenham also offers accommodation, as do several farmhouses in the block - and the Post Office. There are also a few cottages let on a holiday basis, which is not popular locally as it may mean village houses being empty for some of the year. There is also a small caravan site in this area, and occasionally a caravan club will spend the weekend either in a field or by the village hall in Little Wolford.
